info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Mitchell, southwestern Scurry, southeastern Borden and Howard Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coahoma, or 10 miles northeast of Big Spring, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Coahoma, Forsan, Sand Springs, Luther, Big Spring Country Club, Vincent, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark and Elbow. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 172 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
